css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-20320a40-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);max-width:1690px;min-width:initial;padding-top:120px;flex-wrap:wrap;row-gap:20px;-moz-column-gap:2.5%;column-gap:2.5%;}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-20320a40-u{max-width:1170px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-20320a40-u{max-width:90%;padding-top:60px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-20320a40-u{padding-top:30px;}}
